author: Brian Turner
method: Heat the sesame oil in a pan and gently fry the spring onions and garlic for 2-3 minutes to soften, then add the sweetcorn and beef strips. Fry for a further 3-4 minutes, or until the beef is cooked to your liking. Stir in the ketchup, honey and sesame seeds until the beef is evenly coated, then pile onto a serving plate.
ingredients: 1 tbsp sesame oil,  2 spring onions, sliced,  1 garlic clove, crushed to a paste in a mortar and pestle,  3 baby sweetcorn, chopped,  85g/3oz sirloin steak, sliced into strips,  2 tbsp tomato ketchup,  1 tbsp honey,  1 tbsp sesame seeds
